con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-chargeCustomer-RegistrationWithMaxValues
con:testCase.con:description: Tests different easy test cases registration recharge all options derigistration

con:config.con:query: select ULTIMATE_DEBTOR, BANK_ACCOUNT_OWNER, MANDATE_ID From (select * from BANK_DATA Order By ID Desc) WHERE ROWNUM=1

con:request.name: 52P_OCS-walletThresholdEventExtNot-Threshold
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:MessageID>http://www.your.gov/certo/dare</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> <v1:userCode>${#TestSuite#DRC-OCS-extNotify-userCode}</v1:userCode> <v1:result> <!--type: string--> <v1:opReference>${#Project#GUID}</v1:opReference> <v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:subscriberId> <v1:e164Number>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</v1:e164Number> </v1:subscriberId> <!--type: string--> <v1:tariffPlan>3P</v1:tariffPlan> <v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:subscriberState>A</v1:subscriberState> <v1:subscriberSubState>A</v1:subscriberSubState> </v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:technologyCode>0100</v1:technologyCode> <v1:serviceProviderId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-OCS-ID}</v1:serviceProviderId> </v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:monetaryInfo> <!--type: CurrencyCodeType--> <v1:currencyCode>${#Project#Currency_Default}</v1:currencyCode> <v1:opCost exponent="-2">100</v1:opCost> <v1:balance exponent="-2">500</v1:balance> </v1:monetaryInfo> <v1:operationInfo> <!--type: string--> <v1:operationCode>Test</v1:operationCode> <!--type: int--> <v1:subOperationCode>9999</v1:subOperationCode> </v1:operationInfo> <!--type: boolean--> <v1:flagOperationOrCancellation>false</v1:flagOperationOrCancellation> </v1:result> <v1:walletThresholdEvent> <v1:walletThreshold> <!--type: string--> <v1:walletId>2</v1:walletId> <v1:threshold exponent="-2">${#TestSuite#Threshold.thresholdAmount-Min}</v1:threshold> </v1:walletThreshold> </v1:walletThresholdEvent> </v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT * From (SELECT ID, Content FROM SEPA_FILE_CONTENT ORDER BY ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1

con:assertion.name: XML-Expected XML with properties for validation

con:configuration.content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Document xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.008.003.02"> <CstmrDrctDbtInitn> <GrpHdr> <MsgId>*</MsgId> <CreDtTm>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}T*</CreDtTm> <NbOfTxs>5</NbOfTxs> <CtrlSum>*</CtrlSum> <InitgPty> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm> </InitgPty> </GrpHdr> <PmtInf> <PmtInfId>FRST*</PmtInfId> <PmtMtd>DD</PmtMtd> <NbOfTxs>1</NbOfTxs> <CtrlSum>4.00</CtrlSum> <PmtTpInf> <SvcLvl> <Cd>SEPA</Cd> </SvcLvl> <LclInstrm> <Cd>COR1</Cd> </LclInstrm> <SeqTp>FRST</SeqTp> </PmtTpInf> <ReqdColltnDt>*</ReqdColltnDt> <Cdtr> <Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorName}</Nm> <PstlAdr> <Ctry>DE</Ctry> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine> <AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine> </PstlAdr> </Cdtr> <CdtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> </CdtrAcct> <CdtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </CdtrAgt> <ChrgBr>SLEV</ChrgBr> <CdtrSchmeId> <Id> <PrvtId> <Othr> <Id>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorID}</Id> <SchmeNm> <Prtry>SEPA</Prtry> </SchmeNm> </Othr> </PrvtId> </Id> </CdtrSchmeId> <DrctDbtTxInf> <PmtId> <EndToEndId>*</EndToEndId> </PmtId> <InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">4.00</InstdAmt> <DrctDbtTx> <MndtRltdInf> <MndtId>${#Project#Customer-MandantID}</MndtId> <DtOfSgntr>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}</DtOfSgntr> </MndtRltdInf> </DrctDbtTx> <DbtrAgt> <FinInstnId> <BIC>${#Project#Customer-BIC}</BIC> </FinInstnId> </DbtrAgt> <Dbtr> <Nm>bankAccountOwner</Nm> </Dbtr> <DbtrAcct> <Id> <IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN> </Id> </DbtrAcct> <UltmtDbtr> <Nm>ultimateDebtor</Nm> </UltmtDbtr> <RmtInf> <Ustrd>Einmalige Aufladung fuer Ihr Prepaid-Konto ${#TestCase#MSISDN}* (ultimateDebtor).
